newsitem.title: USA: Altera cuts prices on FLEX 10K line by half.
newsitem.headline: Altera cuts prices on FLEX 10K line by half.

text.p: Altera Corp said on Monday that it cut list prices up to 50 percent on its line of high-density FLEX 10K family of programmable logic devices.
The FLEX 10K is the highest density family of programmable logic available with devices up to 100,000 gates, Altera said.

"Increased process and manufacturing efficiencies combined with the increased yield provided by our patented redundancy technology have resulted in dramatic cost reductions, which we are passing along to our customers," Erik Cleage, vice president of marketing, said in a statement.
